segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, reaching out her hand towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of anticipation, wondering if they'll succeed in their little mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems so focused on getting the cookies, not noticing the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall off that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit envious of their bravery and teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene reminds me of simpler times, when getting a cookie was such a big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies are in that jar, to be so tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like cheering them on, but I also want them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
